text: 15.25-26 Apo 19.21, 20.22, 24.17, 1 Ko 16.1-4, 2 Ko 8.1, 9.2, 9.12 Mɨñɨl pen yad Jelusalem amebin. Klays binɨb ne Masedoniya plopens okok ayɨp Akaya plopens okok ayɨp, kɨli Jelusalem binɨb Klays yɨl mɨdebal yɨmgeptek okok kɨlop tap ogɨnap ñɨnɨgun agɨl gos nɨgɨlak. Gos kɨli ke anɨb nɨŋɨd, takaw olap aglɨl mani tap ogɨnap ñel, mɨñɨl yad Jelusalem binɨb Klays yɨl mɨdebal okok kɨlop dam ñɨnɨg amebin.
